channel.title: Making It With Jimmy Diresta, Bob Clagett and David Picciuto
channel.description: Making It is a biweekly audio podcast hosted by Jimmy Diresta, Bob Clagett and David Picciuto. Three different makers with different backgrounds talking about creativity, design and making things with your bare hands.

image.title: Making It With Jimmy Diresta, Bob Clagett and David Picciuto

channel.itunes:subtitle: Making It is a weekly audio podcast hosted by Jimmy Diresta, Bob Clagett and David Picciuto. Three different makers with different backgrounds talking about creativity, design and making things with your bare hands.

item.title: Episode 140: Social Schmedia
item.description:
This week Jimmy Diresta, Bob Clagett and David Picciuto talk about SOME of the people we love to watch.
What We're Working On
Jimmy Diresta Finished Axe Class
David Picciuto Making new wedding rings
Bob Clagett Cake (is a lie) Plate
Links:
Motorcycle sawmill Making It Dubstep ​Peter Brown This Old Tony Chris Salomone - Four Eyes Furniture Ben Uyeda Modern Maker Podcast Frank Howarth ​Samurai Carpenter Andrew Huang FixThisBuildThat ​Made For Profit April Wilkerson Laura Kampf ​Mike Boy - Learn Quick The Hot Ones Trustin Timber Evan and Katelyn What we're watching:
David's Pick of the Week: Peter Brown Bob's Pick of the Week: Dave Guyton Jimmy's Pick of the Week: Scott Turner Special thanks to all of our patrons on Patreon for supporting this episode! Especially:
Make Build Modify Katie Freeman TORBAL Thierry WorksBySolo A Glimpse Inside Malt & Make Corey Ward Evan and Katelyn Wise Ol' Dowel Matthew Serio Uber Workshop Nate Wojciechowski Glen Bertram (Stuff I Do) Jared Shaw William Davis Bryce Waight Derek Swift Philippe Majerus Make Jake Make Old-School Maker (@gfc62) Gary Oshust (SPark Workshop) Afaque Amanulla
If you enjoy the show,
please consider supporting us on Patreon
item.author: david@drunkenwoodworker.com (David Picciuto)
item.source: Making It With Jimmy Diresta, Bob Clagett and David Picciuto

item.title: Making It #006 : How do I quit my job, and do what you do?
item.description: This week, Jimmy, David and Bob address a question that we all get a lot.. "How do I quit my job and do what you do?" There's a lot to think about when pursing being a full time maker, and the guys just scratch the surface of what it takes to chase that dream. Also, they talk about Jimmy's essay in the new book, Maker Pro, which is about making a living as a maker.
item.author: david@drunkenwoodworker.com (David Picciuto)

item.title: Making It #005: Looking Back, Looking Ahead
item.description: This week Jimmy Diresta, Bob Clagett and David Picciuto talk about the good and bad of 2014 as well as what they are hoping for in the new year. As usual, the topic creeps into related ideas like arcade machines, YouTube comments, and again... lasers.

item.title: Making It #001 : Where Does Creativity Come From?
item.description: Welcome to the very first episode of Making It, a podcast hosted by Jimmy Diresta, Bob Clagett and David Picciuto. In this debut episode we talk about who we are, what we do and where we find creativity.

channel.media:description: Making It is a weekly audio podcast hosted by Jimmy Diresta, Bob Clagett and David Picciuto. Three different makers with different backgrounds talking about creativity, design and making things with your bare hands.
